meanings.definition: To focus too narrowly on a specific area or skill, to the detriment of overall knowledge or ability.
meanings.sent1: She was overspecializing in math, so she struggled with other subjects.
meanings.sent2: John realized he was overspecializing in coding and decided to learn more about design.
meanings.sent3: The chef overspecializing in making pasta ended up burning the salad.
meanings.sent4: By overspecializing in one genre, the artist limited her creativity.
meanings.sent5: Overspecializing in history made him a master of the past but a novice of the present.
